description.italian: Completa una battaglia in ciascun livello

description.tchinese: 使用過全部的場地
description.japanese: 全てのステージを使用した
description.arabic: اتم معركة على الاقل في جميع المنصات
description.brazilian: Use todos os estágios.
description.schinese: 使用过全部的场地

description.english: Use at least 30 battle characters
description.french: Utilise au moins 30 personnages de combat
description.italian: Utilizza almeno 30 personaggi battaglia
description.spanish: Juega con 30 luchadores distintos
description.tchinese: 使用過戰鬥角色３０人以上
description.japanese: バトルキャラクターを３０人以上使用した
description.arabic: استخدم 30 شخصية معركة على الأقل
description.brazilian: Use pelo menos 30 personagens de batalha.
description.schinese: 使用过战斗角色３０人以上

description.english: Use at least 30 support characters and win the battles
description.french: Utilise au moins 30 personnages de soutien
description.italian: Utilizza almeno 30 personaggi di supporto
description.spanish: Juega con 30 apoyos distintos
description.tchinese: 使用過輔助角色３０人以上
description.japanese: サポートキャラクターを３０人以上使用した
description.arabic: استخدم 30 شخصية دعم على الأقل و فز بالمعارك
description.brazilian: Use pelo menos 30 personagens de apoio e vence as batalhas
description.schinese: 使用过辅助角色３０人以上

displayName.japanese: おれはお前を越えて行く！！！！

description.english: Defeat at least 100 opponents
description.french: Triomphe d'au moins 100 adversaires
description.italian: Sconfiggi almeno 100 avversari
description.spanish: Derrota a 100 rivales
description.tchinese: 總計打倒１００人以上
description.japanese: トータル１００人以上倒した
description.arabic: اهزم على الأقل 100 خصم
description.brazilian: Derrote pelo menos 100 oponentes.
description.schinese: 共计打倒１００人以上

description.english: Swapped with partner at least 100 times
description.french: Échange au moins 100 fois de place avec un allié
description.italian: Effettua almeno 100 cambi con i tuoi alleati
description.spanish: Intercámbiate con tu compañero 100 veces
description.tchinese: 總計換人１００次以上
description.russian: Провести смену персонажей не менее 100 раз
description.japanese: トータルで１００回以上交代した
description.polish: Zamień się z sojusznikiem co najmniej 100 razy
description.arabic: استبدل مع شريكك 100 مرة على الأقل
description.brazilian: Troque com seu parceiro pelo menos 100 vezes.
description.schinese: 共计换人１００次以上

description.english: Earn at least 100,000,000 Beli in total
description.french: Gagne au moins 100 000 000 Berry au total
description.italian: Guadagna almeno 100.000.000 di berry
description.spanish: Gana al menos 100 000 000 de Beli en total
description.tchinese: 總計獲得一億貝里以上
description.japanese: トータル１億ベリー以上獲得した
description.arabic: اكسب على الأقل 100,000,000 من البيلي
description.brazilian: Obtenha um total de pelo menos 100,000,000 berries.
description.schinese: 共计获得一亿贝里以上
